Date: 2024-08-01T12:34:56Z
Title: Method of the Year: Spatially resolved transcriptomics
Link to article: https://doi.org/10.1038/s41592-020-01033-y 
Citation: Marx, V. (2021). Method of the Year: Spatially resolved transcriptomics. Nature Methods, 18(1), 9-14. https://doi.org/10.1038/s41592-020-01033-y 
Abstract: Nature Methods has crowned spatially resolved transcriptomics Method of the Year 2020.
